message: Your health has reached zero. Game over.
Congratulations! You have gained enough experience to become a master.
Your irresistible charm wins over the kingdom. You achieve a happy ending.
Your unmatched craftsmanship brings prosperity to your realm. You achieve a legendary status.
Your mastery of magic reshapes the world. You become a living legend among spellcasters.
The blossoming romance between [partner_name] and [player_name] becomes a timeless love story, celebrated for generations.
Through your influence, [partner_name] undergoes a profound transformation, altering the course of their destiny.
